messages.content: Hey Avery, quick intro: I'm Jordan. I mostly script in Python. For systems work I dabble in Rust.
Great to meet you, Jordan. I'll keep that in mind.
I'm on macOS for my laptop and Linux on the home server.
Got it.
I'm at Acme Corp. My title is data analyst, but I also help with BI dashboards.
Understood.
Food-wise: no shellfish, and I try to keep lunches light.
Thanks. Noted.
I usually hit the gym early, like 6am. Evening workouts tend to get bumped.
Morning workouts preferred. Noted.
This week is tight: Tuesday afternoon is blocked for the finance review. Thursday morning I'm in a dentist appointment.
Okay.
Friday is flexible after 2pm. If anything needs scheduling, that slot is the best.
I'll use Friday after 2pm as a preference.
Top work priority is the Q2 forecast deck. It's due next Wednesday.
Understood.
For the forecast deck, I need the new churn chart and the SMB growth slide. Use the updated template from last quarter.
Okay, churn chart and SMB growth, using the updated template.
Also, Nina from Finance is the approver. She wants a draft by Monday morning.
Noted.
We adopted a dog last weekend. His name is Milo. He's a golden retriever.
Congrats! Milo sounds great.
Travel-wise, I'm headed to Chicago next month for a conference, probably mid-month.
Okay.
I prefer aisle seats when I fly, and I like flights after 9am.
Got it.
I switched my note app from Notion to Obsidian. I still keep shared docs in Google Docs though.
Understood.
For quick reminders, I prefer text messages over email.
Noted.
Just to clarify, I still use Python for scripts, but my new backend work is in Go, not Rust anymore.
Thanks for the update.
